entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use the `CMAKE_<LANG>_BYTE_ORDER` setting instead of manually detecting endianness or using the `TestBigEndian` module (currently used by Mono) #97423
  • AsnWriter.WriteObjectIdentifier permits invalid sub identifier #97419
    9.0.0
  • LinkerArg doesn't seem to work on net8.0-macos NativeAOT app #97414
  • The type loader has silent integer overflows #97412
  • RuntimeEventSource.Initialize being called before any user code prevents processes from setting safe and performant process defaults. #97410
    9.0.0
  • AOT/analyzer should not warn for MakeGenericType of reference type #97408
  • Performance regression on ASP.NET #97406
  • [browser][MT] System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Partitioner1Chunk.IterationsWithDependency timeout #97396
    9.0.0
  • Discrepanciy between OTel semantic conventions and built-in System.Net metrics #97395
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 3 Regressions on 1/18/2024 8:54:27 PM #97404
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: massive regressions on 1/17/2024 11:26:01 PM #97399
  • [browser][MT] Log_WritingScopes_LogsWithCorrectColorsWhenColorEnabled fails #97382
    9.0.0
  • [browser][JSImport] Support for marshaling Memory<> #97381
    Future
  • [browser][JSImport] Support for marshaling float memory views #97380
    9.0.0
  • Mono Runtime Error in Blazor WASM App when using IL Weaving #97377
  • JIT: Loop alignment related assertion failure during 'Generate code' #97376
  • JSImport can't do Enums #97375
  • Set licence type on packages #97370
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 24 Regressions on 1/20/2024 12:29:16 AM #97400
    9.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly System.Buffers after deploy using windows installer #97366
  • [wasm] Chrome version bumper improvements #97364
  • Misinterpretation of VT_INT/UINT in new COM interop #97363

Closed

  • JIT: Assert `varTypeUsesFloatReg(tree)` blocking libraries-jitstress #97345
    9.0.0
  • [Quality Week] Improve quality of Crossgen2 testing, most notably in context of library tests #74681
    9.0.0
  • [Request] Clarification and info on COMPlus_EnableAlternateStackCheck #97308
  • AOT compiler generates invalid assembler code for Mac Catalyst in .NET 9 #97342
    9.0.0
  • The DontFragment SocketOptionName doesn't appear to work on macOS #76422
    Future
  • [browser][AOT] convert the LLVM value V to DTYPE #97217
    9.0.0
  • Be able to set HexConverter.Casing.Upper on Convert.ToHexString #97397
  • [API Proposal]: Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable<T>` on `Guid` #97378
  • why we need dotnet.wasm? #95076
  • JIT: Invalid loop unrolling with non-top-entered loops #97321
  • Create a Mechanism to Get All Thread Managed Stacks #9389
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Task.WhenEach #97355
  • PInvokeTests.IEnumeratorTests.TestManagedToNative crash #96154
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.DynamicChainTests.PolicyConstraints_Mapped #97357
  • Would the repository benefit from a .vsconfig file for required workloads #13112
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-preview1] [wasi/wasm] EmccCompile.cs: quote the compiler path #97428
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label
  • [wasi/wasm] EmccCompile.cs: quote the compiler path #97427
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change the now Deprecated TEST_BIG_ENDIAN for CMAKE_CXX_BYTE_ORDER #97426
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Properly display `BBJ_COND` true and false targets in `dspKind()` #97425
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert isExactType check to JIT/EE interface call #97424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that TYP_MASK locals are properly tracked and have correct info in the JIT dump #97422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Validate sub-identifier when encoding ObjectIdentifier #97420
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [mono][debugger] Implement decode_fixed_size_array_compute_size_internal #97418
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add basic Vector3 SIMD intrinsics #97416
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Inline tls access on linux/x64 #97413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up gtCloneExpr #97411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve call args interference checking when stores are involved #97409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • enforce FIELD_OFFSET_LAST_REAL_OFFSET size limit for InlineArrays #97403
    breaking-change, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Proposed fix for issue #93189. #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add clrgcexp to NetCoreApp #97401
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix DangerousAddRef usage #97394
    area-System.Security
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CZ_4A to IF_SVE_CZ_4A_L group #97393
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix source_file bug in mono_ppdb_lookup_location_internal #97392
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [browser][MT] enable more tests #97391
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests dispose threads #97390
    arch-wasm, area-Extensions-Logging, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Late cast expansion: more improvements #97387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Decrease frequency of chrome version bumps #97373
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in crosgen2 for risc-v #97368
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix handling of loop alignment targets #97367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #97365
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives shift and rotate operators #97361
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update diasymreader.native to 17.8.0-beta1.23475.2 #97356
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Make JsonReaderState a readonly struct. #97421
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix access to m_pDynamicStaticsInfo #97353
    area-VM-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_ED_1A, IF_SVE_EE_1A, IF_SVE_EB_1A, IF_SVE_EC_1A #97238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Improve BasicBlock dumping #97362
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure loop hoisting recognizes and tracks mask types #97398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add additional assert for throw helper blocks #97246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert #96609 #97407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete workarounds for old Windows SDKs #97358
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [browser] follow up after moving files #97324
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • add supportf for Socket.DontFragment on macOS #97338
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview1] Revert "Fix source_file bug in mono_ppdb_lookup_location_internal" #97360
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an llvm assertion. #97276
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix: OID's cache poisoning with random values #93661
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Improve blazor-frame for browser-bench #97386
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #97002
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • Add Arm64 encoding for IF_SVE_BL_1A #97223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Revert "Fix source_file bug in mono_ppdb_lookup_location_internal" #97359
    needs-area-label
  • Suppress RS1041 analyzer rule #97374
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • React to new Package Validation change #94432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove commented `TaskStatus.Blocked` #97369
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` in `BasicBlock::VisitEHSuccs` #97184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Generalize `FlowGraphNaturalLoop::AnalyzeIteration` #97327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] ObjWriter: Fix over-alignment of .eh_frame entries #96817
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip loop unrolling when the test is not a backedge #97325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unconditionally enable `EETypeNode.SupportsWritableData` #97278
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump branding to .NET 9.0 Preview 2 #97339
    area-Infrastructure
  • Call VariantInit to initialize variants #97349
    test-bug, area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_JD_4A` to `SVE_JN_3B` #97129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono][aot] Add a workaround for #97342. #97347
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • Fixes GCToOSInterface::GetCurrentProcessId #97429
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/8.0-staging] Move a lock to protect m_pDynamicStaticsInfo #97352
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • STJ: Use base getter as fallback solution #97280
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Use TensorPrimitives.ElementWiseSelect instead of ConditionalSelect in more places #97282
    area-System.Numerics
  • Specify higher equality tolerance for ReciprocalEstimate tests #97332
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix: unmanaged memory leak on parsing ill-formed certificates #93647
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT and block struct types #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add an internal mode to `Lock` to have it use non-alertable waits #97227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move PendingTypeLoadTable from the ClassLoader object to a global structure #96653
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove the concept of packable fields from EEClass #96699
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] update owners #97329
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Run all tests #97270
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Added designated output instruction emitters #96741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Convert Array.CopySlow to managed #97202
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: initial support for reinforcement learning of CSE heuristic #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove Compiler::fgConnectFallThrough and BBJ_COND fix-ups in loop phases #97191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Test TotalOrderIeee754ComparerTests: Fix NFloat - NaN testcases for RISC-V #97340
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] Linux/ARM bring-up (4/n) #97269
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • avoid some allocations during TLS handshake #97348
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create directory for Binding Tools For Swift #97208
    area-Meta
  • Optimize lsra for MinOpts #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #97351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [RISC-V] Enable R2RDump #97156
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NO-MERGE] PR benchmark playground #95142
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Hash code tests cleanup #97299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, test-enhancement
  • [release/8.0-staging] EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #97188
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #97021
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wip][browser] Refactor AssertFilesOnDisk function to check subset of files #97031
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono]: Add support for callee saved XMM registers on Windows x64. #97326
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoiding loading and processing same cert file to improve cold start performance … #97267
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
